Description: Fragment of rim and wall of pottery East Greek plate. Outside reserved with narrow glazed bands. Inside, meander hook frieze on top of lip, various banding on wall; perhaps buds to the centre.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: CVA Heidelberg I / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Heidelberg Universität Band I (p. 10 pl. 2.7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1071)
